column4: Newbie ubuntu question: IF you have a php/MySQL site up and running already can you  install some kind of control panel to administrate it? Thanks ahaed of time I am lost!!!
its a shopping cart website and I think phpmyadmin is loaded, but the problem is that the guy workign on the site wants a control panel to load a ssl cert for the site
coudl you install ebox without distubing the exsiting site?
direct admin is nice if your doing hosting or stuff like that
